location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'ROUGH SKETCH MAP of NERVA AND RAIKAN DISTRICTS'

physicalDescription.extent: Material: printed on paper.Dimensions: 210 x 330mm, on sheet 280 x 350mm.

mods.abstract: Map attached to appendix III of HM High Commissioner's despatch No. C.0/120, dated 9 December 1921.The map shows topographical features, contour lines, the Turco-Iraq frontier, Villages and wooded areas.Printing statement: 'Copied by Mohammad Hashim, HE the High Commissioner's Office. Reproduced by Survey Directorate Baghdad, No. 811, Dated 3-6-21'.
